HoriServer

HoriServer¬π is a server on the Discord alternative Revolt. It was created on 3 February 2025 as a result of and was primarily active during Nekori‚Äôs prolonged Discord break throughout February 2025.

A private server, its main purpose is to serve as a fallback limited space with Nekori and their friends. Nekori has stated that they joined Revolt (and thus create the server) to not ‚Äúbe alone for the 3rd time in my [Nekori‚Äôs] life‚Äù. A wave of several few people have joined Revolt for HoriServer in the immediate aftermath of Nekori departing Discord.

At its peak in February, the Revolt server ran alongside the StuffyXP Hangout Discord server, which continued to be ran separately by KayAurora, next in the server‚Äôs management after Nekori. Following the sunsetting of the StuffyXP channels, a successor Discord server was created, bearing the name HoriServer (2), considered to be the spiritual successor to ‚ÄúHoriServer‚Äù on Revolt.

As of September 2025, the server still exists and remains fully open, but has remained mostly inactive after Nekori‚Äôs comeback to Discord in March 2025. A new Revolt server known as NovaServer has been created in July 2025 (due to Nekori taking another break) and has succeeded this one.

The public server structure consists of:

  • The Important category
    • Contains the channels ‚ÄúRules‚Äù, ‚ÄúAnnouncements‚Äù and ‚ÄúJoins & Co.‚Äù
  • The Main category
    • Contains the general chat channel, as well as the ‚ÄúPhotos & Videos‚Äù and ‚ÄúGaming‚Äù channels, along with a starboard
  • The Silly category
    • Contains various meme, HoriCulture or chain channels
